10111000	$2 = 0
10000111	$1 = M[$2]
00111001	$2 = 1
00110000	$0 = 0
00111100	$3 = 0
10101010	$2 << 1
01000001	$0 = $0 + $2
00101000	$0 << 1
01000100	$2 = $2 + $0
10110001	$0 = 1
10000100	$0 = M[$0]
01001110	Pc = PC+3 if $2<$0
00100100	$2 = $2 - $0
01101001	j line 9 (mod:)
10110001	$0 = 1
00100010	$1 = $1 - $0
00110000	$0 = 0
11001001	Pc = pc+2 if $1<$0
01100011	jump to line 3 (pwr:)
10110100	$1 = 0
11000011	$1 = $1 + $2
10011010	M[2] = $1
01110110 	jump to line 22 (done:)
